page.title: 17PETS
page.content: Many people keep pets for company and love.In Horrabridge people keep most of the usual pets like cats,dogs, budgies and hamsters.People can be seen relaxing taking their dogs for a walk or calling for their cats at meal times.They spend leisure time cleaning bird cages and fish bowls or training their animals to do useful things. There are many breeds of cats ,dogs ,rabbits and other animals.Before people take their dogs to shows they usually train them.Before the show starts,they brush them and make them look attractive.Breeders try to breed special characteristics into animals to make them more attractive to pet lovers. Some animals can be very expensive indeed.
